h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Copper Pill Location
content: Soaks are far more plentiful than the Drinks for your Gourds. They are scattered throughout the game, across each chapter. For even more guides on these areas, check out our full Black Myth: Wukong walkthrough. You can also keep track of the Awaken Wine Worm locations and Luoija Fragrant Vine locations, which are key to upgrading your healing potential and Gourd.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Copper_Pill.md', within the main section titled 'Copper Pill', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Copper Pill Location'.
The content is as follows:
Soaks are far more plentiful than the Drinks for your Gourds. They are scattered throughout the game, across each chapter. For even more guides on these areas, check out our full Black Myth: Wukong walkthrough. You can also keep track of the Awaken Wine Worm locations and Luoija Fragrant Vine locations, which are key to upgrading your healing potential and Gourd.
